Plot: The theory that it was in fact Edward De Vere, Earl of Oxford, who penned Shakespeare's plays. Set against the backdrop of the succession of Queen Elizabeth I and the Essex rebellion against her.
Title: Anonymous
Actors: Rhys Ifans, Vanessa Redgrave, Sebastian Armesto, Rafe Spall
tomatoConsensus: Roland Emmerich delivers his trademark visual and emotional bombast, but the more Anonymous stops and tries to convince the audience of its half-baked theory, the less convincing it becomes.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 8 nominations.
